channel.title: CVE Feed for vberkel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vberkel -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0892|2024-06-14T03:35:40.793Z -- vberkel -- schema%20app%20structured%20data
item.description: The Schema App Structured Data plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.0. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the MarkUpdate function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update and delete post metadata via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-0893|2024-06-04T17:58:20.408Z -- vberkel -- schema%20app%20structured%20data
item.description: The Schema App Structured Data plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the MarkupUpdate function in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to update or delete post metadata.
